name: Boogeyman 3
description:
Story
A child lays awake in the light of the moon, unaware the Halloween curse will be starting soon. The radio crackles to life, a mysterious girl who insists on guiding you through the nights. To hopefully survive the horror that is Boogeyman… and friends.

(You do not need to have played 1 or 2 to follow the story in 3)

Gameplay
Navigate a haunting bedroom to survive each nightmarish encounter. Utilise strategic defence, resource management, and cunning tactics to survive each night.

Can you survive the relentless pursuit of the Boogeyman until morning light?

• Use your flashlight and water pistol to fight back against the Boogeyman's terror.

• Watch your beloved toys turn against you as they come to life.

• Learn the distractions that try to deceive you from the real threats.

• Weather will change each night, making it more difficult to hear or see the threats around you.

• Lights will go out one by one, making areas of the room near pitch black.

• Use pocket money to buy new items each night, such as UV glow sticks to slow the Boogeyman and his accomplices down.

Face your fears head-on and immerse yourself in a nightmare you won't soon forget.
